mapper.select: select parentOrders.orderNo as parentOrderNo, parentOrders.orderStatus as parentOrderStatus, parentOrders.orderDate as parentOrderDate, childOrders.orderNo, childOrders.orderStatus, childOrders.orderDate from (select id as orderNo, post_status as orderStatus, post_date as orderDate from wphpm_posts where post_type = 'shop_order' and post_status in ('wc-completed', 'wc-reg-refunded', 'wc-reg-processing', 'wc-reg-preparing' , 'wc-reg-shipped', 'wc-cold-refunded', 'wc-cold-processing', 'wc-cold-preparing', 'wc-cold-shipped', 'wc-cbe-refunded', 'wc-shipped', 'wc-cbe-processing', 'wc-cbe-preparing')) as childOrders inner join (select post_id as orderNo, meta_value as parentOrderNo from wphpm_postmeta where meta_key = '_parent_order_id') as orderDetails on childOrders.orderNo = orderDetails.orderNo inner join (select id as orderNo, post_status as orderStatus, post_date as orderDate from wphpm_posts where post_type = 'shop_order' and post_status = 'wc-processing') as parentOrders on orderDetails.parentOrderNo = parentOrders.orderNo order by 1;
